name: oneLuckiGetPostmanScripts
description: Task to call postman to retrieve a set of test scripts
author: Jeff Przylucki

inputs.name: fileLocation
inputs.label: Script Output location
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file location to store the JSON Postman Script.

inputs.name: apiKey
inputs.label: Postman credential api key
inputs.helpMarkDown: The API credential key used to perform the call to Postman.

inputs.name: downloadEnvironments
inputs.label: Download Environment
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates if the task should pull down Environment Variable definitions also.

inputs.name: environmentFolder
inputs.label: Environment File folder name (relative to Script Output Location)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Folder path where the Environment files should be saved (relative to the root where files are downloaded).
